title: OpenApiFilter without Runstage causes NPE
body:
### Describe the bug

In my app I wanted to add a new openapifilter, and did not specify the runstage:
```
@OpenApiFilter
public class MyFilter implements OASFilter {
}
```

I thought this should use the annotations default for the value,
`RunStage value() default OpenApiFilter.RunStage.RUN;`

But instead I just get a NPE on dev mode startup, see below.


Specifying an explicit runstage allows dev mode to start:
```@OpenApiFilter(OpenApiFilter.RunStage.RUN)
public class MyFilter implements OASFilter {
```

### Expected behavior

Default runstage.RUN gets used if nothing else specified

### Actual behavior

$ mvn quarkus:dev

### How to Reproduce?


[oas-filter-no-ann.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/18585310/oas-filter-no-ann.zip)

unzip
mvn quarkus:dev

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

MINGW64_NT-10.0-26100 NANBCHL9NG3 3.3.6-341.x86_64 2022-09-05 20:28 UTC x86_64 Msys

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 23.0.2 2025-01-21 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-23.0.2+7 (build 23.0.2+7) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-23.0.2+7 (build 23.0.2+7, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.17.2, 3.17.8, 3.18.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.9 (8e8579a9e76f7d015ee5ec7bfcdc97d260186937) Maven home: C:\eclipse\tools\java\maven Java version: 23.0.2, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium, runtime: C:\eclipse\tools\java\23 Default locale: de_DE, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "windows 11", version: "10.0", arch: "amd64", family: "windows"

### Additional information

_No response_
